SEARCH

Package ms.logic

package ms.logic
This package contains the central game engine that orchestrates all game mechanics, state management, and rules of the game.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    ms
     
    ms.logic.operation
    This package contains the core logic for handling operations that can be executed on the minefield.
    ms.logic.rules
    This package contains the validation rules for the operations on the Minesweeper game.
    ms.logic.status
    This package contains the logic for managing the game state, including status transition, statistics tracking and timer functionality in the system.
    ms.commands
    This package contains classes that handle user commands with parsing functionalities for the Minesweeper application.
    ms.model
    This package contains the fundamental data structures and domain objects that are used throughout the application.
    ms.view
    This package contains the view classes, implementing a command-line interface (CLI) that provides a visual interaction with the Minesweeper game.
  • Class
    Description
    DefaultMineFieldFactory
    The DefaultMineFieldFactory class implements the MineFieldFactory interface to create instances of MineField with specified dimensions and mine count.
    Game
    The Game class represents a Minesweeper game instance.
    Game.InvalidGameOperationException
    Exception thrown when an invalid game operation is attempted.
    MineFieldFactory
    The DefaultMineFieldFactory class implements the MineFieldFactory interface to create instances of MineField with specified dimensions and mine count.
